channel.title: Correct sprites
channel.description:
Listen I may sound dumb when I say this because I don't have alot of experience with clients but how can I fix the sprites in the inventory. Example : [IMG]http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii119/1993izcoo4me/prayer.jpg[/img]
If you can help me or tell me why the hell this is please do so.

item.title: Correct sprites
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

The sprite isn’t loading when clicked.

Go into Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 and search for

sideicon#

Change the # to the number of the sideicon which can be located in the sprites folder. Change the .jag in your Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 to ‘.png’ or .jpg to .tmp, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Correct sprites
item.dc:creator: @Exiled-Isle Exiled-Isle
item.description:
@Exiled-Isle wrote:

If you have a specific client look in cache or data or it might just say Sprites edit the gameframe.

Read full topic
